items.text: slower ball, full on middle, and worked off his hips to fine leg
items.postText: Halfway stage of the innings. Bangladesh need less than half the runs.

items.text: full, outside leg stump, and he tees off to slog behind square. Goes down the leg side
over cow corner! Settles on one knee, and deposits this full ball into the stands
items.shortText: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, on off and angling across the right-hander. Cut to deep point. Excellent effort in the deep ensures it doesn't go for four. Allen the man
half-tracker on leg, and he rocks back to pull. Played along the ground to deep midwicket
crucial! Full on middle, and he switches his grip to play an exquisite reverse paddle past short third man
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on leg, and clipped to deep midwicket. Smart cricket
items.postText: Bid: "Reifer has won the final for his team!" -- These two have other ideas, it seems

items.text: scooped over the keeper but Cottrell - from short third man - runs across to cut it off
back of a length on off, and pulled to fine leg
full, on off, and flicked off his pads to midwicket. Protection there
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Flicked away to fine leg
back of a length, just outside off, and pulled to square leg
full, just outside off, and tapped to cover
full, on middle, and he tries to nudge it to the leg side, but Mushfiqur is through his shot too early and this has hit him plumb in front of middle

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim lbw b Reifer 36 (22b 2x4 2x6) SR: 163.63

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and punched to extra cover for a couple
back of a length, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full, on off, and tapped off the front foot
items.shortText: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball, on off, and fended off the front foot. Back to the bowler
items.shortText: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, but Mithun walks across the stumps and then lifts a slog over square leg
items.postText: Shahid: "Two nearly bad lbw decision from umpire !!!!" -- Tight calls, both. Looked out to me, to be honest. Would've clipped leg even if there was a review
items.shortText: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs

items.text: length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
items.postText: Minhaz: "I am biting finger now, nail is all gone"
items.shortText: Roach to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and cut square to deep point
items.postText: Abhijato: "Danyal Rasool just made his BBB debut on the ENG v PAK match, and he's done a fantastic job so far. Do you remember the match in which you made your debut?" -- Hey! India v Bangladesh, 2017 Champions Trophy Warm-up game

items.text: full, just outside off, and he goes for an expansive sweep. Misses, and Hope whips the bails off. Is he stumped? No, back leg was inside the crease
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: slow finger of death! Mithun trying to reverse paddle, and pays the price for it. Length ball angling in, and hitting his front leg. Would've gone on to clip middle stump. Another one gone

dismissal.text: Mohammad Mithun lbw b Allen 17 (14b 1x4 1x6) SR: 121.42

items.preText: Ahsan: "My heartbeat is moving very fast... Now BD players need to calm down and play regular cricket..."
items.text: length ball, on off, and nudged off his hips to deep midwicket
